title: Subpart 8-2 - Hand Power
content:
Subpart 8-2 - Hand Power

State Regulations

Definition of Terms (§ 8-2.1)

General (§ 8-2.2 to 8-2.12)

Hoistways (§ 8-2.13 to 8-2.16)

Hoistway Gates (§ 8-2.17)

Hoistway Doors (§ 8-2.18)

Over Travel (§ 8-2.19)

Penthouses (§ 8-2.20)

Flooring (§ 8-2.21)

Guide Rails (§ 8-2.22)

Machines and Sheaves (§ 8-2.23)

Cars and Car Safeties (§ 8-2.24 to 8-2.28)

Hand Power Dumbwaiters (§ 8-2.29)

Hand Power Hoists (§ 8-2.30)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
